mapper.select: select r.review_num,b.budget_num, u.name, b.budget_title, b.personnel, b.budget, r.review_img, r.like_count, f.file_url from user u, budget_info b, review r, review_file f where u.email=b.user_email and b.budget_num=r.budget_num and r.review_num=f.review_num;
select user_email from review_likecount where review_num=#{review_num}
select review_num, budget_num, review_content, like_count, review_date from review where review_num=#{review_num}
mapper.update: update review set like_count=(select count(*) from review_likecount where review_num=#{review_num}) where review_num=#{review_num}
mapper.delete: delete from review_likecount where review_num=#{review_num} and user_email=#{user_email}
mapper.select: select file_url from review_file where review_num=#{review_num}
